html: Half of all #MN03 tax filers take advantage of SALT deductions, averaging $17,500 each. But the GOP tax bill capped those deductions, and today, thousands of families are feeling the crunch. html: I introduced my first bill today - the bipartisan Protect Our Liberian Community Act. It would move Liberian DED holders to Temporary Protected Status, protecting them from deportation when DED expires in 4 days. #FixDEDpic.twitter.com/VbRKM3AvP8
text: I introduced my first bill today - the bipartisan Protect Our Liberian Community Act. It would move Liberian DED holders to Temporary Protected Status, protecting them from deportation when DED expires in 4 days. #FixDEDpic.twitter.com/VbRKM3AvP8

html: We gave Liberian refugees a legal status with no pathway to citizenship. If DED expires, kids will lose their parents. Businesses will lose their workers. Nicole's Brooklyn Park senior facility won't be able to care for patients: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OjsUknGpu98&t=2s … We must act to #FixDED.pic.twitter.com/z3QJ2RxV6g
text:
We gave Liberian refugees a legal status with no pathway to citizenship.

If DED expires, kids will lose their parents. Businesses will lose their workers. Nicole's Brooklyn Park senior facility won't be able to care for patients: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OjsUknGpu98&t=2s …

We must act to #FixDED.pic.twitter.com/z3QJ2RxV6g

html: If you are here legally, play by the rules and contribute to your community, you should have nothing to fear. But if we don’t act by March 31, DED will expire. It will subject our Liberian neighbors to deportation, and our community is terrified. We have 5 days to #FixDED.pic.twitter.com/ocmIwKkNDU
text:
If you are here legally, play by the rules and contribute to your community, you should have nothing to fear.

But if we don’t act by March 31, DED will expire. It will subject our Liberian neighbors to deportation, and our community is terrified.

We have 5 days to #FixDED.pic.twitter.com/ocmIwKkNDU

html: I am pleased to see that the report did not establish collaboration between the Trump Campaign and Putin’s efforts - but I am concerned that the report explicitly “does not exonerate” President Trump of obstruction of justice.
text: I am pleased to see that the report did not establish collaboration between the Trump Campaign and Putin’s efforts - but I am concerned that the report explicitly “does not exonerate” President Trump of obstruction of justice.

html: Based on the letter from Attorney General Barr, there is no doubt that Vladmir Putin’s government interfered in our democratic process. This is a threat that continues to this day, and we must do all we can to confront it.
text: Based on the letter from Attorney General Barr, there is no doubt that Vladmir Putin’s government interfered in our democratic process. This is a threat that continues to this day, and we must do all we can to confront it.
